item.title: im going to win the Sikorsky Prize
item.dc:creator: Havelok
item.description:
Jeannotvb:

WIKIPEDIA CAN BE EDITTED BY ANYONE ITS COMPLETELY USELESS AND FAKE AND DERP AND UNREALIABEL

Actually, robots keep it accurate.

I’m totally serious. Most edits (even subtle ones) are picked up by the various crazy A.I they have monitoring the articles and is reverted ,at times, faster than you can blink.

In any case, you should all be checking your primary sources in any case. You never want to take one sources word of it, even an “academic” one.

Read full topic

item.title: im going to win the Sikorsky Prize
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
The prize shouldn’t be too hard to win if you build a proper gear box.

And by that, I mean you need like 100 gears and slowly work your way up to the highest gear to get enough power.

That, or you could just master telekenesis, since technically it would also be human powered flight.
